00032 template <class MatType>
00033 class SimpleToleranceTermination
00034 {
00035  public:
00037   SimpleToleranceTermination(const double tolerance = 1e-5,
00038                              const size_t maxIterations = 10000,
00039                              const size_t reverseStepTolerance = 3)
00040             : tolerance(tolerance),
00041               maxIterations(maxIterations),
00042               reverseStepTolerance(reverseStepTolerance) {}
00043 
00049   void Initialize(const MatType& V)
00050   {
00051     residueOld = DBL_MAX;
00052     iteration = 1;
00053     residue = DBL_MIN;
00054     reverseStepCount = 0;
00055     isCopy = false;
00056 
00057     this->V = &V;
00058 
00059     c_index = 0;
00060     c_indexOld = 0;
00061 
00062     reverseStepCount = 0;
00063   }
00064 
00071   bool IsConverged(arma::mat& W, arma::mat& H)
00072   {
00073     arma::mat WH;
00074 
00075     WH = W * H;
00076 
00077     // compute residue
00078     residueOld = residue;
00079     size_t n = V->n_rows;
00080     size_t m = V->n_cols;
00081     double sum = 0;
00082     size_t count = 0;
00083     for(size_t i = 0;i < n;i++)
00084     {
00085         for(size_t j = 0;j < m;j++)
00086         {
00087             double temp = 0;
00088             if((temp = (*V)(i,j)) != 0)
00089             {
00090                 temp = (temp - WH(i, j));
00091                 temp = temp * temp;
00092                 sum += temp;
00093                 count++;
00094             }
00095         }
00096     }
00097     residue = sum / count;
00098     residue = sqrt(residue);
00099 
00100     // increment iteration count
00101     iteration++;
00102 
00103     // if residue tolerance is not satisfied
00104     if ((residueOld - residue) / residueOld < tolerance && iteration > 4)
00105     {
00106       // check if this is a first of successive drops
00107       if (reverseStepCount == 0 && isCopy == false)
00108       {
00109         // store a copy of W and H matrix
00110         isCopy = true;
00111         this->W = W;
00112         this->H = H;
00113         // store residue values
00114         c_index = residue;
00115         c_indexOld = residueOld;
00116       }
00117       // increase successive drop count
00118       reverseStepCount++;
00119     }
00120     // if tolerance is satisfied
00121     else
00122     {
00123       // initialize successive drop count
00124       reverseStepCount = 0;
00125       // if residue is droped below minimum scrap stored values
00126       if(residue <= c_indexOld && isCopy == true)
00127       {
00128         isCopy = false;
00129       }
00130     }
00131 
00132     // check if termination criterion is met
00133     if(reverseStepCount == reverseStepTolerance || iteration > maxIterations)
00134     {
00135       // if stored values are present replace them with current value as they
00136       // represent the minimum residue point
00137       if(isCopy)
00138       {
00139         W = this->W;
00140         H = this->H;
00141         residue = c_index;
00142       }
00143       return true;
00144     }
00145     else return false;
00146   }
00147 
00149   const double& Index() const { return residue; }
00150 
00152   const size_t& Iteration() const { return iteration; }
00153 
00155   const size_t& MaxIterations() const { return maxIterations; }
00156   size_t& MaxIterations() { return maxIterations; }
00157 
00159   const double& Tolerance() const { return tolerance; }
00160   double& Tolerance() { return tolerance; }
00161 
00162  private:
00164   double tolerance;
00166   size_t maxIterations;
00167 
00169   const MatType* V;
00170 
00172   size_t iteration;
00173 
00175   double residueOld;
00176   double residue;
00177   double normOld;
00178 
00180   size_t reverseStepTolerance;
00182   size_t reverseStepCount;
00183 
00186   bool isCopy;
00187 
00189   arma::mat W;
00190   arma::mat H;

00192   double c_index;
00193 }; // class SimpleToleranceTermination
